TopicTitle: Engines are still burning with no fuel.

Articles.Content:
My engines still burn after they run out of fuel, they do not produce any thrust they just make the animation and sound.

Really the only mod I would think that would be causing this is HotRockets.

remove hotrockets and see if the problem goes away. If it does, your hunch is right.

If it's only with a specific mod's rockets, it may be a compatibility failure between that mod and hotrockets too.
